  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticationHandler

    @Component(value="stormpathAuthenticationHandler")
public class StormpathAuthenticationHandler
extends UsernamePasswordWrapperAuthenticationHandler
    This is StormpathAuthenticationHandler that verifies accounts against Stormpath Cloud.

    4.2.0
